a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of population with alcohol use disorder vs. alcohol
Age-standardized prevalence of alcohol use disorder (classified based on alcohol dependency criteria), versus the average
annual alcohol consumption of those aged 15+ years, measured in litres of pure alcohol per capita.

Alcohol consumption
(liters of pure alcohol, projected estimates, 15+ years of age)
Share of population with alcohol use disorder
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024); World Health Organization, via World Bank (2025)
